title: A global set of barley varieties shows a high diversity in starch structural properties and related gelatinisation characteristics
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): D.R.S. Gielens, C.F. De Schepper, N.A. Langenaeken, A. Galant, C.M. Courtin
